§ 4323. Appropriate congressional committees defined In this subchapter, the term “appropriate congressional committees” means—(1) the Committee on Finance and the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs of the Senate; and
(2) the Committee on Ways and Means and the Committee on Homeland Security of the House of Representatives.
(Pub. L. 114–125, title I, § 118, Feb. 24, 2016, 130 Stat. 145.)
Editorial Notes
